thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MR MAX HOLDINGS to offer off-floor distribution of shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MR MAX HOLDINGS to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - MR MAX HOLDINGS CORP :
* Says it plans to offer an off-floor distribution of 1.37 million shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Jan. 26 and Jan. 30
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 10,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/ViQci7
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
